articles.author: Matt Durot
articles.title: America's Richest Families 2024 - Forbes
articles.description: Forbes introduces the first ever ranking of decabillionaire families, who are worth $10 billion or more. Some famous families make the cut; others like the Kennedys and Gettys fall short.

articles.title: Nikki Haley says ‘smart’ India doesn't trust US: ‘I have talked with Modi…’ - Hindustan Times
